member.name: M:PGMainService.Areas.HelpPage.ObjectGenerator.GenerateObject(System.Type)
member.summary: Generates an object for a given type. The type needs to be public, have a public default constructor and settable public properties/fields. Currently it supports the following types: Simple types: , , , , , etc. Complex types: POCO types. Nullables: . Arrays: arrays of simple types or complex types. Key value pairs: Tuples: , , etc Dictionaries: or anything deriving from . Collections: , , , , , or anything deriving from or . Queryables: , .
member.returns: An object of the given type.

member.summary: Comma seperated string of allowable IPs. Example "10.2.5.41,192.168.0.22"

member.name: P:PGMainService.Manager.FilterIPAttribute.AllowedMaskedIPs
member.summary: Comma seperated string of allowable IPs with masks. Example "10.2.0.0;255.255.0.0,10.3.0.0;255.255.0.0"

member.name: P:PGMainService.Manager.FilterIPAttribute.ConfigurationKeyAllowedSingleIPs
member.summary: Gets or sets the configuration key for allowed single IPs
member.value: The configuration key single I ps.

member.summary: Gets or sets the configuration key allowed mmasked IPs
member.value: The configuration key masked I ps.

member.summary: List of allowed IPs

member.name: P:PGMainService.Manager.FilterIPAttribute.DeniedSingleIPs
member.summary: Comma seperated string of denied IPs. Example "10.2.5.41,192.168.0.22"

member.name: P:PGMainService.Manager.FilterIPAttribute.DeniedMaskedIPs
member.summary: Comma seperated string of denied IPs with masks. Example "10.2.0.0;255.255.0.0,10.3.0.0;255.255.0.0"

member.name: P:PGMainService.Manager.FilterIPAttribute.ConfigurationKeyDeniedSingleIPs
member.summary: Gets or sets the configuration key for denied single IPs

member.summary: Gets or sets the configuration key for denied masked IPs
member.value: The configuration key masked I ps.

member.summary: List of denied IPs

member.summary: Checks the allowed IPs.

member.name: M:PGMainService.Manager.FilterIPAttribute.CheckDeniedIPs(System.String)
member.summary: Checks the denied IPs.

member.name: M:PGMainService.Manager.FilterIPAttribute.SplitAndAddSingleIPs(System.String,PGMainService.Manager.IPList)
member.summary: Splits the incoming ip string of the format "IP,IP" example "10.2.0.0,10.3.0.0" and adds the result to the IPList

member.name: M:PGMainService.Manager.FilterIPAttribute.SplitAndAddMaskedIPs(System.String,PGMainService.Manager.IPList)
member.summary: Splits the incoming ip string of the format "IP;MASK,IP;MASK" example "10.2.0.0;255.255.0.0,10.3.0.0;255.255.0.0" and adds the result to the IPList

member.name: T:PGMainService.Manager.IPArrayList
member.summary: Internal class for storing a range of IP numbers with the same IP mask

member.name: M:PGMainService.Manager.IPArrayList.#ctor(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Constructor that sets the mask for the list

member.name: M:PGMainService.Manager.IPArrayList.Add(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Add a new IP numer (range) to the list

member.name: M:PGMainService.Manager.IPArrayList.Check(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Checks if an IP number is within the ranges included by the list

member.name: M:PGMainService.Manager.IPArrayList.Clear
member.summary: Clears the list

member.name: M:PGMainService.Manager.IPArrayList.ToString
member.summary: The ToString is overriden to generate a list of the IP numbers

member.name: P:PGMainService.Manager.IPArrayList.Mask
member.summary: The IP mask for this list of IP numbers

member.name: T:PGMainService.Manager.IPList
member.summary: Summary description for Class1.

member.name: M:PGMainService.Manager.IPList.Add(System.String)
member.summary: Add a single IP number to the list as a string, ex. 10.1.1.1

member.name: M:PGMainService.Manager.IPList.Add(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Add a single IP number to the list as a unsigned integer, ex. 0x0A010101

member.name: M:PGMainService.Manager.IPList.Add(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds IP numbers using a mask for range where the mask specifies the number of fixed bits, ex. 172.16.0.0 255.255.0.0 will add 172.16.0.0 - 172.16.255.255

member.name: M:PGMainService.Manager.IPList.Add(System.UInt32,System.UInt32)
member.summary: Adds IP numbers using a mask for range where the mask specifies the number of fixed bits, ex. 0xAC1000 0xFFFF0000 will add 172.16.0.0 - 172.16.255.255

member.name: M:PGMainService.Manager.IPList.Add(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Adds IP numbers using a mask for range where the mask specifies the number of fixed bits, ex. 192.168.1.0/24 which will add 192.168.1.0 - 192.168.1.255

member.name: M:PGMainService.Manager.IPList.AddRange(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds IP numbers using a from and to IP number. The method checks the range and splits it into normal ip/mask blocks.

member.name: M:PGMainService.Manager.IPList.AddRange(System.UInt32,System.UInt32)
member.summary: Adds IP numbers using a from and to IP number. The method checks the range and splits it into normal ip/mask blocks.

member.name: M:PGMainService.Manager.IPList.CheckNumber(System.String)
member.summary: Checks if an IP number is contained in the lists, ex. 10.0.0.1

member.name: M:PGMainService.Manager.IPList.CheckNumber(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Checks if an IP number is contained in the lists, ex. 0x0A000001

member.name: M:PGMainService.Manager.IPList.Clear
member.summary: Clears all lists of IP numbers

member.name: M:PGMainService.Manager.IPList.ToString
member.summary: Generates a list of all IP ranges in printable format

member.name: P:PGMainService.Models.PaymentClaimInput.Observation
member.summary: Consideraciones que deban tenerse en cuenta al momento de registrar el reclamo.
member.example: Se registró un pago por error del operador

member.name: P:PGMainService.Models.CreditCard.Id
member.summary: Identificador de tarjeta crediticia

member.name: P:PGMainService.Models.CreditCard.Name
member.summary: Nombre de la tarjeta crediticia

member.name: P:PGMainService.Models.CreditCard.Type
member.summary: Tipo de la tarjeta crediticia

member.name: T:PGMainService.Models.PaymentInput
member.summary: Entrada de pago.

member.name: P:PGMainService.Models.PaymentInput.WithTransactionNumber
member.summary: Opcional. Boolean. Flag para obtener el número de la transacción en la respuesta de la petición. ATENCIÓN: La respuesta posee un formato nuevo.

member.name: P:PGMainService.Models.PaymentInput.MerchantId
member.summary: Identificación del comercio. Este dato es provisto al comienzo del proceso.

member.name: P:PGMainService.Models.PaymentInput.ElectronicPaymentCode
member.summary: Código del Pago Electrónico (EPC) que identifica en forma unívoca la petición o intención de pago.

member.name: P:PGMainService.Models.PaymentInput.CurrencyCode
member.summary: Código internacional ISO 4217 de la moneda de pago

member.name: P:PGMainService.Models.PaymentInput.Amount
member.summary: Importe total del pago. Máximo 10 dígitos en la parte entera y 2 dígitos fijos para la parte fraccionaria; separados por coma.

member.name: P:PGMainService.Models.PaymentInput.ProductId
member.summary: Identificador único de tarjeta de crédito de Provincia Net (Ver Información, Listado de Tarjetas).

member.name: P:PGMainService.Models.PaymentInput.Payments
member.summary: Cantidad de cuotas a realizarse en el pago.

member.name: P:PGMainService.Models.PaymentInput.MailAddress
member.summary: Dirección de correo electrónico del usuario final (se enviará el comprobante al mismo).

member.name: P:PGMainService.Models.PaymentInput.CallbackUrl
member.summary: Dirección de retorno para control de aplicación. Una vez concluida la operación se redireccionará a través de un POST los resultados de la transacción a este URL especificado.

member.name: P:PGMainService.Models.PaymentInput.ValidateEPCreturnUrl
member.summary: Dirección URL a donde se volverá automáticamente si el ElectronicPaymentCode está repetido. Si es vacío o nulo, no se valida el Electronic Payment Code.

member.name: P:PGMainService.Models.PaymentInput.BarCode
member.summary: Código de barras de la factura, sticker o transacción, hasta 60 dígitos.

member.name: P:PGMainService.Models.PaymentInput.Channel
member.summary: Especifica el canal para considerar opciones de inferfaz responsive. Por defecto, Web.

member.name: P:PGMainService.Models.PaymentInput.Metadata
member.summary: OBSOLETO - Representación string de un JSON que almacena cualquier información. La información de este campo es devuelvo por el callback.
member.example: {"CommerceItems": [{"Code": "TEST1","Description": "Nombre del producto que ha pagado con un largo 001","Price": "122.56"},{"Code": "TEST2","Description": "Nombre del producto que ha pagado con un largo 002","Price": "1233.56"}]}

member.name: P:PGMainService.Models.PaymentInput.CommerceItems
member.summary: Representación string de un JSON que almacena cualquier información. La información de este campo es devuelvo por el callback.

member.name: P:PGMainService.Models.PaymentInput.AppVersion
member.summary: Si desea dejar constancia de una versión específica de Payment Gateway, especifíquela aquí. Posibles: 3500, 3740, 4100

member.name: P:PGMainService.Models.PaymentInput.IsSimulation
member.summary: Si desea marcar la transacción como simulada, especifique 1
